content: HL7 Australia working group context for Argonaut Australia project http://site.hl7.org.au/news/current-working-group-overview/

Grahame Grieve... is advising us on how the Agency can use the learnings from Project Argonaut to give us a head start, backed up by a local Argonaut project will bring the technical community together in ways weâ€™ve never seen before

Some further deriving from AU Base and terminology binding cleaning done on http://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7au/argonaut-au/index.html - any review of this spec and comment on issues https://github.com/hl7au/argonaut-au/issues is much appreciated
